body:
Comment 4 by **holmesjack234**: 
john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$ cat hello.go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {

var ar = [5]int {5,7,12,4,6}
var far = [5]float64 {5.1,7.0,12.2,4.9,6.6}
// type interface sum()
fmt.Printf("hello, world\n, %d, %f\n", ar[3], far[2])
}

john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$ gofmt hello.go
Segmentation fault: 11
john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$ gofmt -l -w hello.go
Segmentation fault: 11
john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$ ls
6.out examples garp.zip hello.go~ snup.go
echo.go exp hello progs tmp
example exp2 hello.go snup
john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$ gofmt -l -w snup.go
Segmentation fault: 11
john-holmes-imac:go johnholmes$

The result seems to be the same, but the message is slightly different.

Jack
